name: Tape Boy Lofi Surfer
description:
Surf on different study/chill objects in this lofi, relaxing, casual game.
Better experience with headphones

How to Play:
Tap towards the direction you want to jump

Everytime Tap Boy touches any surface he resets the jump ability

Collect diamonds to score points

***Mobile friendly***
I hope you like it! Have a nice day!
